game.name: Royal Vermin
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 공유 및 분할 화면, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Climb, throw, and survive in this chaotic 2-4 player physics-based party game! As your preferred critter caught in a sudden flood, you must fight in a massive trash pile to claim your crown as the true "Royal Vermin."
game.shortDescriptionEn: Climb, throw, and survive in this chaotic 2-4 player physics-based party game! As your preferred critter caught in a sudden flood, you must fight in a massive trash pile to claim your crown as the true "Royal Vermin."
